Articles.Content:
Hola,

I like building space stations and surface bases, but I find that the stock parts don't have that space station/surface base command center look/feel. I've been using mk2 lander cans, but what I'm looking for would ideally have more than one command station and enough slots for each command station to have a kerbal, the command stations/windows would be facing outwards in the same manner that the lander cans do (I don't know the proper terminology for "out the side"), the IVA would have those fancy MFDs that I see in a lot of mods (Raster prop monitor or something?), it would also be nice if one or more of the command consoles looked like a desk with a lamp or charts or something built onto it and a MFD (kinda like the rear seats in the mk.4 space plane mod).

Thanks for taking a look, and I would be very grateful if anyone could make something like this into one of their parts pack mods or know of a mod that has something like this.

I would suggest Stockalike Station Parts Expansion http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/91814-1-02-Stockalike-Station-Parts-Expansion-%2804-06-2015-bugfixes%29

I use all of these parts in my stations and believe they have what you're looking for in the Command Center.

Hope that helps!
